member.name: M:RestBus.ServiceStack.Cookies.AddPermanentCookie(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Sets a persistent cookie which never expires

member.name: M:RestBus.ServiceStack.Cookies.AddSessionCookie(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Sets a session cookie which expires after the browser session closes

member.name: M:RestBus.ServiceStack.Cookies.DeleteCookie(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a specified cookie by setting its value to empty and expiration to -1 days

member.name: M:RestBus.ServiceStack.Cookies.AddCookie(System.Net.Cookie)
member.summary: Sets a persistent cookie which expires after the given time
